Name: Strasberi Sling
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
Review: Raspberry and apple combine beautifully in this refreshing drink with its clean citrus tang.
History: Created in 2002 by Alex Kammerling, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Strasberi Sling contains 245 calories
